passage_text: What does Stamina Mean. You may have such questions as What Is Stamina and How To Gain Stamina,or you may also seek several helpful information about How To Build Up Stamina. Besides,you may be interested in answers related to Increase My Stamina,too. Read more as following:

(Video). Stamina is an energy in the body that helps you complete any type of task over a long period of time. Find out about what losing stamina means with help from a personal trainer with 20 years of experience in this free video clip. advertisement.

Stamina: The energy and strength for continuing to do something over a long period of time; power of sustained exertion, or resistance to hardship, illness etc; The basic elements of a thing; rudimentary structures or qualities. Hope this helped!

vigor is for the strength of physical attacks. stamina is related to how much damage you take from physical attacks. however, it also determines how much damage you take from poison and regen. the higher the stamina, the higher the damage from poison or the boost from regen.

Video Transcript. Hi, I'm Lia Montelongo, and this is what does losing stamina mean. Stamina is an energy in the body that helps you complete any type of task over a long period of time. Find out about what losing stamina means with help from a personal trainer with 20 years of experience in this free video clip. advertisement.
